findings.title: M03. Eager Division
findings.description: Division is done too early, which worsens the rounding error.

findings.title: M04. Documentation Mismatch
findings.description: The documentation provided does not match the actual implementation of the smart contract.

findings.title: Implement the check for wallet duplicates
findings.description: The audit report recommends implementing a check to prevent duplicate wallets.

findings.title: Denial of Service State in withdraw_tokens_from_community_wallet()
findings.description: The community wallet withdrawal function will become blocked indefinitely after 18 months since the vesting started due to overflow in the expression vesting_start_account_balance * (months_since_vesting_start + 1), blocking about 5.5% of the total supply.

findings.title: Withdrawal of Vested Funds from Partnership Wallet
findings.description: Allows the owner to withdraw vested funds from the partnership wallet

findings.title: withdraw_tokens_from_marketing_wallet()
findings.description: Allows the owner to withdraw vested funds from the marketing wallet

findings.title: Unlocked Funds Withdrawal
findings.description: The function allows the withdrawal of funds that are not unlocked yet, allowing the wallet to be fully drained.
